name: vitamin

B2 any of a group of natural substances that are necessary in small amounts for the growth and good health of the body: a vitamin pill Oranges are full of vitamin C.
More examplesFewer examplesA diet deficient in vitamin D may cause the disease rickets.Studies suggest that regular intake of the vitamin significantly improves brain function.Oranges are a good source of vitamin C.The illness depletes the body of important vitamins.Which vitamins should you take for skin problems?
